earn_rewards_description: Collect loyalty points on every order and redeem them for discounts on your next shop.
smart_shopping_description: Discover the best deals and save money on your grocery shopping with our intelligent recommendations.
fast_delivery_description: Get your groceries delivered to your doorstep quickly and safely with our trusted delivery partners.
fresh_quality_description: We ensure all products meet the highest quality standards, so you always get the freshest ingredients.
privacy_policy_sub: what data you share with us?
logout_confirm_body: Are you sure you want to logout?
start_shopping_message: Start shopping to see your orders here
exit_app_message: Are you sure you want to exit the application?
product_description: Fresh and nutritious milk product with high quality standards. Perfect for daily consumption and cooking needs.
chicken_nuggets_description: Perfect for smaller meals or snacks, Chicken Nuggets 20 Pieces are essential for every child's lunchbox.
payment_success_description: Your Deposit for Baqalty has been successfully done
privacy_policy_intro: At Baqalty ("we", "our", or "us"), we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our grocery shopping application.
information_we_collect_intro: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our services:
personal_information_desc: Personal Information: When you sign up for Baqalty, we collect your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information.
financial_data_desc: Financial Data: To help manage your orders and payments, we collect data such as payment methods, transaction histories, and delivery addresses. We do not store your banking credentials.
how_we_use_information_intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
service_provision_desc: Service Provision: To process your orders, manage deliveries, and provide customer support.
communication_desc: Communication: To send you order updates, promotional offers, and important service notifications.
improvement_desc: Service Improvement: To analyze usage patterns and enhance our application features and user experience.
data_security_desc: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. All data is encrypted during transmission and stored securely. We regularly review our security practices to ensure your information remains protected.
your_rights_intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
access_data_desc: Access: You can request access to the personal data we hold about you.
correct_data_desc: Correction: You can request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete data.
delete_data_desc: Deletion: You can request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal and operational requirements.
portability_desc: Portability: You can request a copy of your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
contact_us_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@baqalty.com or through our customer support channels.
how_place_order: How do I place an order?
how_place_order_answer: Browse products, add items to your cart, choose your payment method, and confirm your order.
payment_methods_accepted_answer: We accept Credit Cards, Cash on Delivery, and Baqalty Wallet.
track_order_answer: You can track your order in real-time through the app. Go to 'My Orders' section and select your order to see its current status and estimated delivery time.
delivery_time_answer: Standard delivery takes 2-4 hours within the city. Express delivery is available for 1-2 hours with additional charges.
cancel_order_answer: You can cancel your order within 30 minutes of placing it, or before it's confirmed by the store. Go to 'My Orders' and select 'Cancel Order'.
return_policy_answer: We offer 7-day return policy for most items. Items must be in original condition with receipt. Contact customer support for return requests.
delivery_message: We will deliver your goods to you in the shortest possible time.
session_expired_title: Your session has expired. Please login to continue.
unexpected_server_response: Unexpected server response. Please try again later.
service_unavailable: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
an_error_occurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
request_timeout: Request timeout. Please check your internet connection and try again.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error_handling_error: An error occurred while handling the error
too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
gateway_timeout: Gateway timeout. Please try again later.
network_switching_error: Network connection is changing. Please wait a moment and try again.
update_mandatory_message: You must update the app to continue. We have added new features and fixed some bugs.
update_optional_message: We have added new features and fixed some bugs to improve your experience.
